Alaris.Irc.DccFileSessionManager

Alaris.Irc.DccFileSessionManager Class Reference

This class checks each file session to see if it has not had any activity within the timeout period so that inactive sessions can be closed. More...

Detailed Description

This class checks each file session to see if it has not had any activity within the timeout period so that inactive sessions can be closed.
